summary: This is an email chain forwarding the official statement from the Manhattan U.S. Attorney, Geoffrey Berman, regarding the death of defendant Jeffrey Epstein. The email discusses the need to reach out to victims following Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the official statement; his death is announced and discussed.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Issued the official statement on the death of Jeffrey Epstein, which is being forwarded in this email chain.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The Manhattan U.S. Attorney issues a statement announcing and commenting on the death of defendant Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 10, 2019, forwarding the U.S. Attorney's statement on Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Manhattan U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman issued an official statement regarding Epstein's death.
The email discusses the need for law enforcement to reach out to victims following Epstein's death.
